title: Like-A-Flight
text: This site was created as the final project for a full-stack development course, so my design and my code. Basically, this website shows a list of available vacations. The user can login and mark the flights that he likes (hey, I didn't come up with the brief). As an Admin one can edit/add/delete vacations and view a simple chart that shows likes per vacation data Of course, its fully responsive. Also, both airplane animation and like button animation are mine and were implemented as a Lottie code

title: StuffThatWorks intro
text: StuffThatWorks' goal is finding treatments' effectiveness for chronic conditions via crowdsourcing, and that’s what I tried to explain (original illustrations by the talented Maya Shleifer).

title: StuffThatWorks' Various UI animations
text: A variety of StuffThatWorks animations - were mostly implemented as an integral part of the UI.

title: StuffThatWorks' map prototype
text: A concept for a feature that shows other condition-community members that are similar to you.

title: Waze Voice Recording
text: It’s basically an ad for Waze's “Record your own navigation instructions” feature (from 2017 I believe). A personal favorite of mine, I think I like the simplicity and the fit of the concept to the feature itself (but maybe it’s just me).
